CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 塔；高楼；塔楼；瞭望塔；钟楼；（电视或无线电信号的）发射塔；塔式结构；塔状物；塔式容器；塔状堆积物；超群的人或物（比喻用法）
高耸；屹立；超越；突出；俯视；支配；卓越；远远高于；远远超过；

word_group.brief_definition: (危难时的)可依靠的人, 主心骨
高层建筑；摩天大楼塔楼
输电塔；输电铁塔；传输塔
办公大楼；办公室大楼；办公楼

bilingual.source: Get off the boat at Tower Bridge.
How did they get to the Eiffel Tower?
bilingual.target: 他们怎么去的埃菲尔铁塔？

bilingual.source: When did they go to the Eiffel Tower?
bilingual.target: 他们什么时候去了埃菲尔铁塔？

bilingual.source: Next to the bridge is the Tower of London.
We also went to the top of the Eiffel Tower.
bilingual.target: 我们还去了埃菲尔铁塔的顶部。

bilingual.source: It had sharp teeth, so I was happy to be up the tower.
bilingual.target: 它有锋利的牙齿，所以我很高兴在塔上。

bilingual.source: After a short walk from the tower, we saw a tiger too.
bilingual.target: 从塔上走了一小段路后，我们也看到了老虎。

bilingual.source: At about three o'clock, we took the Paris Underground to the Eiffel Tower.
bilingual.target: 下午三点左右我们乘巴黎地铁去了埃菲尔铁塔。

list.abstract: tower的寓意是高耸、超过、翱翔。完全诠释了这个完全80后的杂志社团。
Tower是24小时的网上办公室，可以在这里快速处理任务、开展讨论、查看项目进展，随时与团队高效协作。 2020年12月，企业级研发管理工具ONES宣布完成对协作工具Tower的收购，两个品牌仍将保留。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a tower of sponges.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就是个海绵做的塔。

yingyinNormal.en: Each airport's control tower guides each plane to take off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个机场的控制塔能指导每架飞机起飞。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeff no longer existed. My tower was deserted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰夫不复存在，南塔空无一人。

yingyinNormal.en: Meet chimp nine. Here she is tasking at what is called the Lucas Tower, the object of which is to move the tower from peg to peg, without placing a larger block on top of a smaller block.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来见见九号猩猩。视频中她正在玩汉诺塔游戏的目标是通过在三根柱子间调整每层塔的位置使塔层从大到小排列游戏中大片不能压在小片上面。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: And I think I know why. The prototype 5K tower was built at their corporate headquarters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这就是原因了，5K塔的原型就建在他们的公司总部。

yingyinNormal.en: I am constantly strolling in and saving him like a little princess in the tower. Sometimes I'd like to be the princess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次我都会替他说话，就像拯救困在塔中的公主有时候我也想当公主。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you remember where we spent Mallory's birthday weekend? At Coit tower? Yeah. That tall cement nozzle thing on the hill. Exactly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还记得周末我们给马洛里过生日的地方吗？科伊特塔？是的 。就是山上那座高高的水泥喷嘴一样的建筑？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: In the biblical story of the Tower of Babel, all of humanity once spoke a single language until they suddenly split into many groups unable to understand each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在圣经故事巴别塔中，所有人类都讲同一种语言，直到他们突然分裂成多个相互之间都听不懂的族群。

yingyinNormal.en: Our record show that 1812 calls ended at the moment of the explosion. 52 of those calls were tethered to the cell tower nearest the train, so one of those calls was made by our bomber.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数据显示爆炸时刻共有1812通电话完成通话，有52通电话经由离火车最近的信号塔转接，其中就有设弹人打的电话。

yingyinNormal.en: We have call-pens going to and from her off the cell tower by your farm and town homes. That's 250 precision locations and activations consistent with your mutual activities. Katherine...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从你的农场和别墅附近的信号发射塔记录到她的手机位置记录，有250个准确的地点及活动记录和你的活动情况相吻合。凯瑟琳……

yingyinNormal.en: No. Jesus! A secret brother. What is he, locked up in a tower, or something?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有……天哪！还有个秘密兄弟。怎么，他被锁在塔里，还是怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: Teterboro tower, I need a runway. Cactus 1549 needs to go to the airport right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 泰特伯勒塔台，我需要条跑道，全美航空1549需要机场紧急降落。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing says Paris like the Eifel Tower. The Iron Lady can be seen from all over the city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有任何东西比艾菲尔铁塔更能代表巴黎。从巴黎的任何角落都能看到这位「铁娘子」。

yingyinNormal.en: The quickest way to find your bearings is to take the trip to the top of the Sydney Tower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要找到您的方向，最快的方法就是走上悉尼塔的最顶点。

yingyinNormal.en: Newark tower, what have you got? You have runway 2-9 cleared and ready. You need emergency landing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 纽瓦克塔台，你们那呢？跑道29可以降落，你需要紧急降落？

yingyinNormal.en: At 2:00 p.m., we load the van. J.P. drives. We drop Jean-Louis, Annie and Albert at the North Tower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下午2点上车，杰P开车，尚路易、安妮和亚博在北塔下车。

yingyinNormal.en: For starters, Koba scored a perfect 15 on the Lucas Tower. Every test result verifies its effectiveness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为新手，库巴在汉诺塔中拿到了满分，每一次试验都验证了它的药效。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Do you hear me? At midnight! This gives me the time to sneak over to the North Tower and check the rigging.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听到了吗？午夜！这样我才有空到北塔检查安装情形。

yingyinNormal.en: We stole the Statue of Liberty, the small one from Las Vegas. And I won't even mention the Eiffel Tower! Also Vegas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还偷走了自由女神像，虽然是拉斯维加斯那个迷你版的，还有艾菲尔铁塔！也是拉斯维加斯的

yingyinNormal.en: Tower, stop your departure. Got an emergency returning. 1549, bird strike. He lost both engines. Returning immediately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 塔台，停止起飞安排，我们有个紧急返场，全美航空1549，遭到鸟击，他的双发都停车了，要立即返航。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 塔；塔楼；塔台；塔式容器；塔状堆积物

examination_example.sentence: A string of accidents, including the partial collapse of a cooling <highlight>tower</highlight> in 2007 and the discovery of an underground pipe system leakage, raised serious questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年一座冷却塔的部分倒塌，以及地下管道系统泄漏的发现等一系列事故引发了严重的问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 塔；塔楼；塔台；塔式容器；塔状堆积物

examination_example.sentence: Had the bell <highlight>towers</highlight>' wooden frames burned down, the heavy bells would have crashed down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果钟楼的木架被烧毁，沉重的钟就会倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: If the wooden frame of the <highlight>towers</highlight> had caught fire, it could have sent the bells—the largest of which, weighs 13 tons—crashing down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果双塔的木质框架着火，可能会导致钟——最大的重达13吨——倒塌。

examination_example.sentence: While the world looked on, the 500 firefighters at the scene then battled to prevent the flames from reaching the two main <highlight>towers</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在全世界的注视下，现场的500名消防员奋力阻止火焰蔓延到两座主塔楼。

examination_example.sentence: There were other important figures, but Marconi <highlight>towered</highlight> over them all in reach, power, and influence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有其他重要人物，但马可尼在影响力、权力和影响力方面都远远超过他们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's possible to drive in a matter of minutes from sleek (光亮的) office <highlight>towers</highlight> near the airport to a Vietnamese mall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在几分钟内从机场附近光亮的办公大楼到一个越南购物商场是有可能实现的。

examination_example.sentence: An office <highlight>tower</highlight> on Miller Street in Manchester is completely covered in solar panels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曼彻斯特米勒街的一座办公大楼完全被太阳能电池板覆盖。

examination_example.sentence: When the <highlight>tower</highlight> was first constructed in 1962, it was covered with thin square stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该塔于1962年首次建造时，覆盖着薄薄的方形石头。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 塔；塔楼；塔台；塔式容器；塔状堆积物

examination_example.sentence: Look over the "city of dreaming spires" from St Mary's Church <highlight>Tower</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从圣玛丽教堂塔楼上眺望这座“梦幻尖塔之城”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We got dressed and walked to Canton <highlight>Tower</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们穿好衣服，走到广州塔。

examination_example.sentence: After Jack finished creating a special sandcastle with stairs, <highlight>towers</highlight> and walls, he took pictures of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在杰克完成了一个有楼梯、塔和墙的特殊沙堡后，他拍了照片。

examination_example.sentence: Magdalen College Its bell <highlight>tower</highlight> and gardens are famous sights in Oxford.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫德林学院它的钟楼和花园是牛津的著名景点。
